00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';

00036 // privileges checking
00037 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('membership', 'r');
00038 
00039 if (!$can_read) {
00040     die('<div class="errorBox">You dont have enough privileges to view this section</div>');
00041 }
00042 
00043 // local settings
00044 $max_print = 10;
00045 
00046 // clean print queue
00047 if (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'clear') {
00048     // update print queue count object
00049     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\'0\');</script>';
00050     utility::jsAlert(__('Print queue cleared!'));
00051     unset($_SESSION['card']);
00052     exit();
00053 }
00054 
00055 if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00056     if (!$can_read) {
00057         die();
00058     }
00059     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00060         // make an array
00061         $_POST['itemID'] = array($_POST['itemID']);
00062     }
00063     // loop array
00064     if (isset($_SESSION['card'])) {
00065         $print_count = count($_SESSION['card']);
00066     } else {
00067         $print_count = 0;
00068     }
00069     // card size
00070     $size = 2;
00071     // create AJAX request
00072     echo '<script type="text/javascript" src="'.JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'prototype.js"></script>';
00073     echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00074     // loop array
00075     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00076         if ($print_count == $max_print) {
00077             $limit_reach = true;
00078             break;
00079         }
00080         if (isset($_SESSION['card'][$itemID])) {
00081             continue;
00082         }
00083         if (!empty($itemID)) {
00084             $card_text = trim($itemID);
00085             echo 'new Ajax.Request(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'lib/phpbarcode/barcode.php?code='.$card_text.'&encoding='.$sysconf['barcode_encoding'].'&scale='.$size.'&mode=png\', { method: \'get\', onFailure: function(sendAlert) { alert(\'Error creating card!\'); } });'."\n";
00086             // add to sessions
00087             $_SESSION['card'][$itemID] = $itemID;
00088             $print_count++;
00089         }
00090     }
00091     echo '</script>';
00092     if (isset($limit_reach)) {
00093         $msg = str_replace('{max_print}', $max_print, __('Selected items NOT ADDED to print queue. Only {max_print} can be printed at once')); //mfc
00094         utility::jsAlert($msg);
00095     } else {
00096         // update print queue count object
00097         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\''.$print_count.'\');</script>';
00098         utility::jsAlert(__('Selected items added to print queue'));
00099     }
00100     exit();
00101 }
00102 
00103 // card pdf download
00104 if (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'print') {
00105     // check if label session array is available
00106     if (!isset($_SESSION['card'])) {
00107         utility::jsAlert(__('There is no data to print!'));
00108         die();
00109     }
00110     if (count($_SESSION['card']) < 1) {
00111         utility::jsAlert(__('There is no data to print!'));
00112         die();
00113     }
00114     // concat all ID together
00115     $member_ids = '';
00116     foreach ($_SESSION['card'] as $id) {
00117         $member_ids .= '\''.$id.'\',';
00118     }
00119     // strip the last comma
00120     $member_ids = substr_replace($member_ids, '', -1);
00121     // send query to database
00122     $member_q = $dbs->query('SELECT m.member_name, m.member_id, m.member_image, mt.member_type_name FROM member AS m
00123         LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id
00124         WHERE m.member_id IN('.$member_ids.')');
00125     $member_datas = array();
00126     while ($member_d = $member_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00127         if ($member_d['member_id']) {
00128             $member_datas[] = $member_d;
00129         }
00130     }
00131 
00132     // include printed settings configuration file
00133     include SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'admin_template'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00134     // check for custom template settings
00135     $custom_settings = SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin'.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$sysconf['template']['theme'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'printed_settings.inc.php';
00136     if (file_exists($custom_settings)) {
00137         include $custom_settings;
00138     }
00139     // chunk cards array
00140     $chunked_card_arrays = array_chunk($member_datas, $card_items_per_row);
00141     // create html ouput
00142     $html_str = '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">'."\n";
00143     $html_str .= '<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head><title>Member card Label Print Result</title>'."\n";
00144     $html_str .= '<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />'."\n";
00145     $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00146     $html_str .= 'body { padding: 0; margin: 1cm; font-size: '.$card_font_size.'pt; font-family: '.$card_fonts.'; }'."\n";
00147     $html_str .= '.labelStyle { width: '.$card_box_width.'cm; height: '.$card_box_height.'cm; text-align: center; margin: '.$card_items_margin.'cm; border: '.$card_border_size.'px solid #666666; padding: 5px;}'."\n";
00148     $html_str .= '.labelHeaderStyle { background-color: #CCCCCC; font-weight: bold; padding: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; }'."\n";
00149     $html_str .= '#photo { border: 1px solid #666666; float: left; width: '.$card_photo_width.'cm; height: '.$card_photo_height.'cm; overflow: hidden; }'."\n";
00150     $html_str .= '#photo img { width: 100%; }'."\n";
00151     $html_str .= '#bio { float: left; padding-left: 5px; text-align: left; }'."\n";
00152     $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00153     $html_str .= '</head>'."\n";
00154     $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00155     $html_str .= '<table style="margin: 0; padding: 0;" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">'."\n";
00156     // loop the chunked arrays to row
00157     foreach ($chunked_card_arrays as $card_rows) {
00158         $html_str .= '<tr>'."\n";
00159         foreach ($card_rows as $card) {
00160             $html_str .= '<td valign="top">';
00161             $html_str .= '<div class="labelStyle">';
00162             if (trim($card_header_text) != '') { $html_str .= '<div class="labelHeaderStyle">'.$card_header_text.'</div>'; }
00163             $html_str .= '<div id="photo">';
00164             $html_str .= '<img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.IMAGES_DIR.'/persons/'.$card['member_image'].'" border="0" />';
00165             $html_str .= '</div>';
00166             $html_str .= '<div id="bio">';
00167             $html_str .= '<div>'.( $card_include_field_label?__('Member ID').' : ':'' ).'<strong>'.$card['member_id'].'</strong></div>';
00168             $html_str .= '<div>'.( $card_include_field_label?__('Member Name').' : ':'' ).'<strong>'.$card['member_name'].'</strong></div>';
00169             $html_str .= '<div>'.( $card_include_field_label?__('Membership Type').' : ':'' ).'<strong>'.$card['member_type_name'].'</strong></div>';
00170             $html_str .= '<div style="text-align: center;"><img src="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.IMAGES_DIR.'/barcodes/'.str_replace(array(' '), '_', $card['member_id']).'.png" style="width: '.$card_barcode_scale.'%; margin-top: 10px;" border="0" /></div>';
00171             $html_str .= '</div>';
00172             $html_str .= '</div>';
00173             $html_str .= '</td>';
00174         }
00175         $html_str .= '<tr>'."\n";
00176     }
00177     $html_str .= '</table>'."\n";
00178     $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00179     $html_str .= '</body></html>'."\n";
00180     // unset the session
00181     unset($_SESSION['card']);
00182     // write to file
00183     $file_write = @file_put_contents(FILES_UPLOAD_DIR.'member_card_gen_print_result.html', $html_str);
00184     if ($file_write) {
00185         // update print queue count object
00186         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.$(\'queueCount\').update(\'0\');</script>';
00187         // open result in window
00188         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.FILES_DIR.'/member_card_gen_print_result.html\', \'popItemcardGen\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00189     } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Cards failed to generate, possibly because '.SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.FILES_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00190     exit();
00191 }

00206     if (isset($_SESSION['card'])) {
00207         echo '<font id="queueCount" style="color: #FF0000">'.count($_SESSION['card']).'</font>';

00209     echo ' '.__('in queue waiting to be printed.'); //mfc

00216 /* ITEM LIST */
00217 // table spec
00218 $table_spec = 'member AS m
00219     LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id';
00220 // create datagrid
00221 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00222 $datagrid->setSQLColumn('m.member_id',
00223     'm.member_id AS \''.__('Member ID').'\'',
00224     'm.member_name AS \''.__('Member Name').'\'',
00225     'mt.member_type_name AS \''.__('Membership Type').'\'');
00226 $datagrid->setSQLorder('m.last_update DESC');
00227 // is there any search
00228 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00229     $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00230     $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00231     if (count($words) > 1) {
00232         $concat_sql = ' (';
00233         foreach ($words as $word) {
00234             $concat_sql .= " (m.member_id LIKE '%$word%' OR m.member_name LIKE '%$word%'";
00235         }
00236         // remove the last AND
00237         $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00238         $concat_sql .= ') ';
00239         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($concat_sql);
00240     } else {
00241         $datagrid->setSQLCriteria("m.member_id LIKE '%$keyword%' OR m.member_name LIKE '%$keyword%'");
00242     }
00243 }
00244 // set table and table header attributes
00245 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00246 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00247 // edit and checkbox property
00248 $datagrid->edit_property = false;
00249 $datagrid->chbox_property = array('itemID', __('Add'));
00250 $datagrid->chbox_action_button = __('Add To Print Queue');
00251 $datagrid->chbox_confirm_msg = __('Add to print queue?');
00252 $datagrid->column_width = array('10%', '70%', '15%');
00253 // set checkbox action URL
00254 $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00255 // put the result into variables
00256 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, $can_read);
00257 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00258     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.__('Found').' '.$datagrid->num_rows.' '.__('from your search with keyword').': "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>'; //mfc
00259 }
00260 echo $datagrid_result;
00261 /* main content end */
00262 
00263 ?>
